title: Follow Your Heart
description: Suzanne Styles is a young and beautiful woman vacationing on the island of St. Lucia. Itâ€™s a trip she hopes will help her move past feelings of guilt that have recently put her life on hold. When friendships and romance unexpectedly blossom in this tropical paradise, she will find that only if she can learn to follow her heart will she start to live again.
author: Sabine Garvey Campbell
